Title: A multistep continuous flow synthesis machine for the preparation of pyrazoles: Via a metal-free amine-redox process
Abstract: © 2016 The Royal Society of Chemistry.A versatile multistep continuous flow setup is reported for the four-step conversion of anilines into pyrazole products. The synthesis machine incorporates the use of amine-redox chemistry through diazotization and a metal-free Vitamin C mediated reduction. The machine can be used for the synthesis of an array of analogues or the scale up of an individual target.
